name: Air Hockey Pro
description:
Description:

  •  Select the number of games you’d like to play in a match, or just have a quick game of 30 seconds.
  • Includes three different camera views:
    • On PC: High View (3D) , Low View (3D), and Top View (2D).
    • On Android: 3D Portrait, 3D Landscape, and 2D Portrait.
  • Play against 3 different levels of AI: Beginner, Intermediate, and Expert.

Rules for the game:

  • Make sure the puck doesn’t stay over 7 seconds on your side, or you lose the point.
  • Score 7 points to win a game.
  • Control the striker using touch.

Installation steps:

Just extract the zip and click on "Air Hockey Pro.exe".

Enjoy!
